doc:
Charles Heslop https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Heslop 0 Charles Heslop (8 June 1883 in Thames Ditton, England – 13 April 1966) was a British actor.He starred in the BBC television comedy Percy Ponsonby as a talkative barber. The series was broadcast in 1939, but was cancelled with the outbreak of war Charles_Heslop ( 8_June_1883 in Thames_Ditton , England – 13_April_1966 ) was a_British_actor.He starred in the_BBC_television_comedy_Percy_Ponsonby as a_talkative_barber .
